title: Data Visualisation
text:
For my Critical Thinking module, I had to come up with an idea to help SIT students study better which was a Smart Study Spot Finder. The data below shows the results of a survey conducted among SIT students to find out how useful our applications would be.



Study

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
text:
I utilized DeepSeek AI as my primary generative AI tool for this assessment. I chose this platform specifically because of its robust capability to generate, explain, and refine code implementationsâ€”particularly for data visualization tasks in R and Quarto. The tool proved instrumental in several key areas: it helped generate properly formatted R code for creating quantitative visualizations with appropriate chart types and aesthetics; it provided clear explanations of visualization principles and best practices; it assisted in debugging code syntax errors; and it offered guidance on structuring Quarto documents with proper figure labeling and cross-referencing.



deepseek
